animeTitle: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Seisou-hen
animeDescription: Kaoru goes to the harbor every day to see if Kenshin has returned. After a while, she starts looking back at her life with Kenshin and all the things that have happened.(Source: ANN)
